name: Rot Gut Moonshine
special:
d3 uses
Rot Gut Moonshine grants one SCVM +2 Attack and suffers 1 damage.
lore: Drinking Rot Gut Moonshine may not kill you, but it will definitely shorten your life span.

name: Pig Roast
special:
ONE USE
Restore all of your SCVM to max HP.
lore: My children are upset because the family pig is missing. Should I tell them now or wait until after dinner?
